name: Oyako de Asobo: Miffy no Omocha-bako
summary: Oyako de Asobo: Miffy no Omocha-bako; enjoy while communicating with your child using Wii. Play with Miffy in a world like a picture book! A fun mini-game will appear each time you play. Six elements for communication with children: 1. Twelve ways to change depending on how you proceed 2. Even if your child can't read the letters, the characters will speak and you will feel safe 3. 25 kinds of mini games like toys that can be enjoyed by even young children and small children 4. Enjoy playing with communication that matches your child's age, such as “Play together with your baby” and “Challenge with one child” 5. Reliable timer function that allows you to play time 6. In addition to “Play with Fun”, Miffy's “Play with Coloring” is also available.
